post.description: This endpoint enables you to reframe the input media. You can provide video input through a pre-signed URL to generate reframed output video.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the input source.

source.description: Details of the source including a pre-signed URL.

video.description: Video Input details for Generate reframed video request.

sceneEditDetection.description: Apply Scene Edit Detection before reframing.

overlays.description: Configuration details for generating the reframed video.

aspectRatios.description: A list of aspect ratios for the output video.

outputConfig.description: Configuration details for generating the reframed video.

ReframedVideoInputRequestPayload.summary: Video input to generate Reframed video output

source.url: <pre-signed url for downloading the video input>
pre-signed url for downloading the overlay input>

schema.description: Response indicating that the reframed video job has been successfully submitted.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

statusUrl.description: The URL to monitor the status of the job.

get.summary: Get the result for a job
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the result of an asynchronous reframed job initiated using the `jobId` returned from the generate reframed video operation.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID to get status for an asynchronous generate reframed video job.

oneOf.title: NotStartedJobResponse
oneOf.description: Response indicating that the reframed video job has not started.

status.description: The status of the reframed video job.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

oneOf.title: InProgressJobResponse
oneOf.description: Response indicating that the reframed video job is in progress.

status.description: The status of the reframed video job.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

oneOf.title: SuccessJobResponse
oneOf.description: Success response for the reframed video job.

status.description: The status of the reframed video job.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

items.description: Success response for the generate reframed video job.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the output.

destination.description: Details of the output destination, including a pre-signed URL.

outputs.description: Details of the successful job output.

oneOf.title: PartialSuccessJobResponse
oneOf.description: Response for a reframed video job that partially succeeded.

status.description: The status of the reframed video job.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

oneOf.description: Success response for the generate reframed video job.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the output.

destination.description: Details of the output destination, including a pre-signed URL.

oneOf.description: Error response for the generate reframed video job.

error_code.description: A code representing the specific error type.

message.description: A description of the error that occurred.

error.description: Details of the error encountered during the reframing process.

outputs.description: Details of the job's partial success, including successful outputs and any errors encountered.

oneOf.title: FailureJobResponse
oneOf.description: Error response for a reframed video job that failed.

status.description: The status of the reframed video job, indicating a failure.

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job.

items.description: Error response for the generate reframed video job.

error_code.description: A code representing the specific error type.

message.description: A description of the error that occurred.

error.description: Details of the error encountered during the reframing process.

outputs.description: Details of the errors encountered during the job.

GenerateReframedVideoJobPendingResponse.summary: The reframed video job is in not_started status.

GenerateReframedVideoJobInProgressRespon.summary: The reframed video job is in progress

destination.url: <pre-signed URL to download the reframed video file>

GenerateReframedVideoJobPartialSuccessRe.summary: The reframed video job partially succeeded

destination.url: <pre-signed download URL for reframed video file>

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the input source.

source.description: Details of the source including a pre-signed URL.

video.description: Video Input details for Generate reframed video request.

sceneEditDetection.description: Apply Scene Edit Detection before reframing.

overlays.description: List of overlays associated with the job input.

aspectRatios.description: A list of aspect ratios for the output video.

outputConfig.description: Configuration details for generating the reframed video.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the input source.

source.description: Details of the source including a pre-signed URL.

VideoInput.description: Video Input details for Generate reframed video request.

mediaType.description: The media type for the overlay graphic.

startTime.description: Start time for the overlay, in the format HH:MM:SS:FF.

duration.description: Duration of the overlay, in the format HH:MM:SS:FF.

position.description: Details about the position of the overlay.

oneOf.description: Repeat is not specified when `mediaType` is PNG.
Repeat is valid only when `mediaType` is GIF.

anchorPoint.description: Anchor point for the position reference.

offsetX.description: Horizontal offset for the anchor point.

offsetY.description: Vertical offset for the anchor point.

Repeat.description: Defines the repeat behavior of the overlay.

width.description: The width of the scaled overlay.

height.description: The height of the scaled overlay.

MediaType.description: Enum defining the supported media types for the overlay graphic.

AnchorPointPreset.description: Enum defining the anchorPoint presets for the overlay anchor.

RepeatType.description: Enum defining the repeat behavior types for the overlay.
